humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: Based on the rules provided and the pathology report, the patient has no metastatic carcinoma in the sentinel lymph nodes (part 2 and part 3) and the non-sentinel lymph node (part 1) is also negative for metastatic carcinoma. Additionally, part 5 mentions a left intra mammary lymph node excisional biopsy that is negative for malignancy. Therefore, the N stage is N0, as all assessed lymph nodes are negative for metastatic carcinoma.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report indicates that there was no metastatic carcinoma found in the sentinel lymph nodes (0/1) in Part 2 and Part 3, and no metastatic carcinoma was found in the non-sentinel lymph node (Part 1). Additionally, there is no mention of any metastatic carcinoma in the left axillary lymph nodes (Part 5). Therefore, the patient's pathologic N stage is N0.
